rules.name: myRule_12
rules.label: If Opportunity Stage is 'Internal Approval' Industrial Products

rules.name: myRule_15
rules.label: If Opportunity Stage is 'Internal Approval' Intermodal

rules.name: myRule_18
rules.label: If Opportunity Stage is 'Internal Review' Automotive

rules.name: myRule_3
rules.label: If Opportunity Stage is 'Internal Approval' Automotive

rules.name: myRule_6
rules.label: If Opportunity Stage is 'Internal Approval' Coal

rules.name: myRule_9
rules.label: If Opportunity Stage is 'Internal Approval' Industrial Development

Flow.description: 1. It changes Opportunity record type to Read Only 2. Create a Task 3. Send email to NPO Approver for review

value.stringValue:
OR( AND( AND(ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName ),ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, 'Internal Review'), [Opportunity].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'NS_General_Opportunity'),
ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].NS_Originating_Department__c, 'Industrial Products') ),
AND( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].NSSales_Approval_Needed__c),[Opportunity].NSSales_Approval_Needed__c == True, ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, 'Internal Review'), [Opportunity].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'NS_General_Opportunity' ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_12
formulas.expression:
OR( AND( AND(ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName} ),ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, 'Internal Review'), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'NS_General_Opportunity'),
ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.NS_Originating_Department__c}, 'Industrial Products') ),
AND( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.NSSales_Approval_Needed__c}),{!myVariable_current.NSSales_Approval_Needed__c} == True, ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, 'Internal Review'), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'NS_General_Opportunity' ) )

value.stringValue:
OR( AND( AND(ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName ),ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, 'Internal Review'), [Opportunity].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'NS_General_Opportunity'),
AND(ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].NS_Originating_Department__c, 'Intermodal'),[Opportunity].NS_Estimated_Volume__c>= 1000) ),
AND( ISCHANGED([Opportunity].NSSales_Approval_Needed__c),[Opportunity].NSSales_Approval_Needed__c == True, ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].StageName, 'Internal Review'), [Opportunity].RecordType.DeveloperName = 'NS_General_Opportunity' ) )

OR( AND( AND(ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName} ),ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, 'Internal Review'), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'NS_General_Opportunity'),
AND(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.NS_Originating_Department__c}, 'Intermodal'),{!myVariable_current.NS_Estimated_Volume__c}>= 1000) ),
AND( ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.NSSales_Approval_Needed__c}),{!myVariable_current.NSSales_Approval_Needed__c} == True, ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.StageName}, 'Internal Review'), {!myVariable_current.RecordType.DeveloperName} = 'NS_General_Opportunity' ) )
